text: The Talk of the Town is a 1942 American comedy drama movie directed by George Stevens and starring Cary Grant, Jean Arthur, Ronald Colman. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was nominated for 7 Academy Awards in 1943. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1940s comedy- drama movies Category:1942 romantic comedy movies Category:1942 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by George Stevens
title: The Talk of the Town (1942 movie)
